tools.name: Get-DiskSpaceReport
tools.description: Reports disk space usage with configurable warning/critical thresholds.

CriticalPercent.description: Usage percentage to trigger Critical status. Defaults to 90.

ComputerName.description: Server to check. Defaults to the local computer.

WarningPercent.description: Usage percentage to trigger Warning status. Defaults to 80.

tools.name: Get-PendingUpdates
tools.description: Checks for pending Windows updates on remote servers.

ComputerName.description: Server to check. Defaults to the local computer.

tools.name: Get-ServerInventory
tools.description: Collects hardware and OS inventory from a Windows server using CIM.

ComputerName.description: The server to inventory. Defaults to the local computer.

tools.name: Get-ServiceHealthReport
tools.description: Checks the status of critical Windows services on remote servers.

ComputerName.description: Server to check. Defaults to the local computer.

ServiceName.description: One or more service names to check. Defaults to common infrastructure services.

tools.name: Invoke-InfraHealthCheck
tools.description: Runs a comprehensive infrastructure health check and generates an HTML dashboard.

DiskWarningPercent.description: Disk usage percentage to trigger a warning. Defaults to 80.

DiskCriticalPercent.description: Disk usage percentage to trigger a critical alert. Defaults to 90.

ComputerName.description:
One or more server names to check. If not specified, queries AD for all
enabled server OS computers.

OutputPath.description: Directory for the HTML report. Defaults to .\Reports.

SmtpServer.description: SMTP server for sending the report.

SearchBase.description: AD OU to scope the server query. Only used when ComputerName is not specified.

CriticalServices.description: List of services to monitor. Defaults to common infrastructure services.
